ygData.subject: Re: What's the Point?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Prolonged swimming. If you find yourself in a situation where you must be swimming or treading water for a long period of time, your stamina will decrease
ygData.messageBody:
Bob Stewart wrote:

> Likewise, I find the Jig o' Vigor to be of no use. Have I missed some good
> and valued application?

Prolonged swimming.

If you find yourself in a situation where you must be swimming or
treading water for a long period of time, your stamina will decrease
over time just as your hit points do during the heat of battle. Playing
yourself a little jig helps get you through.

Of course, not falling off the boat in the first place would be MUCH better....


Marianda
Accomplished Swimmer
